channel.title: Item drops/rises?
channel.description:
After the free trade, what items' values do you think will increase or decrease dramatically and why? Also, specifically, what will happen to the value of corrupt dragon weapons?
Note: If anyone wants to donate some GP or items to me on RS, it would be greatly appreciated, because I'm dirt poor. :\ PM me please if you're oh so kind-hearted. :)

item.title: Item drops/rises?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

WOOT FREE TRADE AND WILDY!

Read full topic

item.title: Item drops/rises?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:18, topic:380317”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=476149.msg3482726#msg3482726 date=1296320730]
A lot of people speculate that people will stop using the grand exchange, which is fucking laughable, as people are too lazy to not use it.
[/quote]Uuh, I don’t know if you realized a few years back before the grand exchange used to exist, people actually stood and sold stuff. It’s going to be more frustrating trading with the grand exchange without the ability to communicate and guess with prices. Plus people still stand and shout even with the grand exchange. Please get your shit straight before posting. That is all. :)[/quote]Don’t post again, thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Item drops/rises?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:20, topic:380317”][quote author=Lin link=topic=476149.msg3483256#msg3483256 date=1296347133]

A lot of people speculate that people will stop using the grand exchange, which is fucking laughable, as people are too lazy to not use it.
[/quote]Uuh, I don’t know if you realized a few years back before the grand exchange used to exist, people actually stood and sold stuff. It’s going to be more frustrating trading with the grand exchange without the ability to communicate and guess with prices. Plus people still stand and shout even with the grand exchange. Please get your shit straight before posting. That is all.

How is it going to be harder and more frustrating? You act as if you have to hit the exact price someone is selling at. I’m sure if you buy above or sell below, it’ll be exactly what it is now, (refunding/gaining the difference).[/quote]+ the fact it shows the average price in the GE.

item.title: Item drops/rises?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:14, topic:380317”]Regen braces are rare?[/quote]They were, until now. Everyone is dumping everything of any value because they are dumb and afraid of free trade. This is why so much shit is crashing right now. When free trade comes it will stabilize again, prices will go up, and bam, tons of people with investments will be even richer.

Read full topic

item.title: Item drops/rises?

item.title: Item drops/rises?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:12, topic:380317”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=476149.msg3482732#msg3482732 date=1296321333]

I don’t see why people predict things with no plausible reasoning to back it up.

I’m pretty sure pvp gear (vesta, statius etc) will drop, as people will farm it from revs.

GWD-items and other boss-exclusive items might rise a bit, as people are afraid of teaming up with people they dont know (due to the gravestone update).

Dragon Bones won’t be affected much, perhaps they’ll go up a bit due to green dragon botters being invalidated due to PvP.

Rares will go up as fuck, as well as onyx bracelets (few people trade them on the GE as street prices are WAYYY higher).

Other than that, i can’t think of anything changing much in price at all.

Really? There’s not much use in onyx bracelets, is there?
[/quote]The enchanted version is incredibly useful and wanted.[/quote]

Yeah they are incredibly rare.

Read full topic
